name: Physics Phriends (DEMO)
description:
Physics Phriends is a game about two best friends, but their friendship is suddenly put on hold after one of them gets kidnapped! Be a good friend and go help!

The full game

Your donations can help me complete the full game. The more money I get, the more development time I can add to the game.

Features
  • 15 levels (The full game will have much more)
  • Cute, stylistic graphics.
  • Partial gamepad support.
  • Cute music track.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/gr8b8m8ir8...
